sentences.sContent: I couldn't reach the pedals on her bike.
sentences.sCn: 我骑她的车够不到脚蹬子。

sentences.sContent: She put her foot down on the accelerator pedal.

phrases.pCn: （汽车等的）油门踏板；[机]加速踏板
（美）油门；加速器；汽车加速踏板

remMethod.val: ped(脚) ＋ al → 脚踏的东西 → 踏板

trans.tranCn: （自行车的）踏脚，踏板，脚蹬；（汽车或机器的）踏板
trans.tranOther: one of the two parts of a bicycle that you push round with your feet to make the bicycle go forward
